title: Bug 114905 - Default value lost in list box of report parameter after modification
description: The default value set in the list box of a report parameter is lost after modifying the default value.
OB: Upon reopening the Edit Parameter dialog, the list box default value is not retained after it has been modified.
EB: The list box of the report parameter should retain the modified default value even after reopening the Edit Parameter dialog.
SR:
1. Create a new report parameter and set the Display type to List Box.
2. Input three values: "aa", "bb", "cc"; set "aa" as the default and click OK.
3. Reopen the Edit Parameter dialog, modify "aa" to "aaa", and click OK directly.
4. Reopen the Edit Parameter dialog.
5. Verify that the list box default value is still set to "aaa" as expected.
